Articles.Content:
Has anyone else played this game on Android?

The reason I ask is because I loaded it up for the first time today and I immediately recognized the music that was playing during the tutorial. It was from KSP. Maybe KSP licensed music from some company and so did this other developer. But just in case it is an original creation by Squad, I wanted to ask here first and make sure everything is above board.

Thank you for pointing this out, gonzo98x, but it isn't a legal issue for Squad, since Squad themselves got the music from other sources. And now that this has been cleared up, it seems this thread has served its purpose.
